description: Good-looking Ricky Daniels is sitting at a bar, and overhears the owner tall, slim Addison Graham, pleading with someone over the phone to give him more time to come up with some cash. Muscular Ricky hears him saying he would even suck a dick if he has too so naturally he proposes to pay him to do exactly that. Addison doesn’t waste any time getting on his knees, and sliding Ricky’s massive cock all the way to the back of his throat. A few positions and some dick pumps lead them to a satisfying orgasm.
title: It Pays To Get Laid: Bareback
